item.title: picman: photo sorting tool
item.description: github https://github.com/sigmonsays/picman I wrote a basic tool to replace my krufty bash scripts that imports my photos from various locations into their final resting place. The tool operates in steps where each step is kind of idempotent. The set of all steps is called a workflow and operates on a single file. see code. Each step operates on the same workflow object, which primarily has a state object State Object code
